thread.title: BRIEF-Cogint Entered Deal With Certain Institutional Buyers For Purchase,Sale Of 2.7 Mln Shares In Registered Direct Offering For $13.5 Mln, On Jan 10

title: BRIEF-Cogint Entered Deal With Certain Institutional Buyers For Purchase,Sale Of 2.7 Mln Shares In Registered Direct Offering For $13.5 Mln, On Jan 10
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Cogint Inc:
* COGINT - ON JAN 10, CO ENTERED DEAL WITH CERTAIN INSTITUTIONAL BUYERS FOR PURCHASE,SALE OF 2.7 MILLION SHARES IN REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING FOR $13.5 MILLION
* COGINT INC SAYS PURCHASE PRICE TO BE PAID BY BUYERS IS $5.00 PER SHARE - SEC FILING
* COGINT- CONDUCTED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OFFERING WITH SAME PURCHASERS TO ISSUE , FOR NO ADDITIONAL CONSIDERATION, WARRANTS TO BUY 1.4 MILLION SHARES
* COGINT- WARRANTS HAVE AN EXERCISE PRICE OF $6.00 PER SHARE Source text ( bit.ly/2APFKYs ) Further company coverage:
